title: serif typefaces
content:
I like these typefaces because they are quite rounded.  
Especially the first one (dark background) I love the serif with that round movement. I will be glad if anyone knows the name of these 2 types

cheers

e.

author: chopie

comments.content: Top one is [Barcelona ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829064008/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/barcelona) by Edward Benguiat.

thank you

what do you mean with "duplicate/to be deleted"?
